title: hadamard product between sparse and dense tensor in pytorch
body_html: Are there any implementation that realize the hadamard product between sparse and dense tensor in pytorch? It's very weird that we can get the hadamard product between sparse and sparse tensor by sparse_a * sparse_b, while we can't get the hadamard product between sparse and dense tensor by any func.
